Posts.Content: Moopy, my dear, when I need new shoes whether uggs or strappy sandles, I go to Zappos.com. They are just the best!!! No problem with returns--They pay shipping both ways--AND--they are fast!! Mine arrive in one day usually. Go ahead, take a look--order several pair--and return what doesn't suit you. Believe me, you CAN'T go wrong!! I've even sold my sweet hubbie on them. Have fun--Big hug--Cheryl
Posts.Title: Request for a VIRTUAL INTERVENTION with my wife Moopy
